Pre-Game Insights: Player prop bet options for Willy Adames, Brenton Doyle and others are available when the Milwaukee Brewers host the Colorado Rockies at American Family Field on Saturday at 7:10 p.m. ET.

At +229, the Rockies are the moneyline underdogs in this matchup versus the Brewers, who are listed at -282. In this matchup, Milwaukee (-1.5) is favored on the run line with -141 odds. The over/under for this game is 8. The odds to eclipse the over are -118, while the odds are -102 to go under.
